item.description:
QC Magazine

presents:

Susan Lindauer former CIA asset

and author of EXTREME PREJUDICE

 

 

“Someday, when the entertainment industry dares

to cover these issues, her story

will be a Hollywood Movie.”

 

Chris Pratt

filmmaker “deceptions”

As a U.S Intelligence Asset, Susan Lindauer covered anti-terrorism at the Iraqi Embassy in New York from 1996 up to the invasion. Her prophetic warnings to leaders in Washington about the War with Iraq led to her arrest as an “Iraqi Agent.”

She was then subjected to one year in prison at Carswell Air Force Base in Fort Worth, Texas without a trial or a hearing and was threatened with indefinite detention and forcible drugging to shut her up. After five years of indictment without a conviction or a guilty plea, the Justice Department dismissed all charges five days before President Obama's inauguration.

You can hear her story, ask Susan Lindauer questions, and you can buy her book,Saturday October 6th, 4:00 PM in Northampton, MA You can learn more about her book online - http://extremeprejudiceusa.wordpress.com/2010/10/10/extreme-prejudice-by-susan-lindauer/

 

$5 admission charge
item.how_to_find_us: In back of the Woodstar Cafe building on first floor
item.name: Susan Lindauer "Extreme Prejudice" in Brattleboro
